preview.heading: AI-powered Instagram Account Analysis
preview.description: This dashboard provides a preview of how we analyze Instagram accounts using engagement signals, post performance, and AI-driven insights.

previewPro.preview: You are viewing a preview analysis.
previewPro.pro: Pro unlocks post-level breakdowns, copy patterns, and goal-based action plans.

goals.title: What's your current goal?
goals.subtitle: Choose one focus to see how your current metrics support that goal.

growFollowers.role: This metric helps you estimate whether your content earns reactions that lead to follow intent.
growFollowers.status: Your current performance suggests a stable foundation, with room to improve consistency.
growFollowers.action: Next step: repeat one high-performing format weekly and tighten the first line hook.

increaseLikes.role: This metric shows whether your posts reliably earn lightweight positive feedback.
increaseLikes.status: Your current performance looks steady, with opportunities to sharpen what resonates.
increaseLikes.action: Next step: test two visual-first formats and keep the best one for the next 5 posts.

increaseComments.role: This metric reflects how often your content triggers conversation, not just quick reactions.
increaseComments.status: Your current performance indicates engagement is present, but discussion could deepen.
increaseComments.action: Next step: add a specific question or a two-choice prompt and pin the best reply.

boostReach.role: This metric helps you track whether you are giving the algorithm enough consistent opportunities to distribute.
boostReach.status: Your current performance appears workable, but reach typically improves with steadier cadence.
boostReach.action: Next step: set a fixed weekly schedule and maintain it for two cycles before adjusting.

buildPersonalBrand.role: This metric indicates whether your content earns trust and relevance signals from the audience.
buildPersonalBrand.status: Your current performance suggests you have a base signal, but messaging clarity can improve.
buildPersonalBrand.action: Next step: keep one consistent point of view and repeat it across a three-post series.

getBrandDeals.role: This metric is a proxy for audience quality and how strongly your content holds attention.
getBrandDeals.status: Your current performance shows a reasonable baseline, with room to improve signal strength.
getBrandDeals.action: Next step: publish one case-study style post and track which angle gets the most responses.

becomeCreator.role: This metric reflects whether your publishing system is consistent enough to learn and iterate.
becomeCreator.status: Your current performance looks sustainable, but consistency is the main lever to strengthen.
becomeCreator.action: Next step: lock a repeatable weekly rhythm and batch-produce your next week‚Äôs posts.

monetizeConsistently.role: This metric helps you validate whether attention translates into meaningful interest over time.
monetizeConsistently.status: Your current performance shows early signals, but outcomes benefit from a clearer offer narrative.
monetizeConsistently.action: Next step: add one clear call-to-action in a weekly post and keep it consistent for a month.

followers.role: Followers represents the audience base you are trying to grow.
followers.status: Your current baseline is clear, and consistency will matter most going forward.

engagementRate.role: Engagement rate signals whether your content earns enough reactions to convert to follows.
engagementRate.status: Your current signal looks workable, and tighter consistency can improve it.

avgLikes.role: Average likes reflect lightweight interest that can support discovery.
avgLikes.status: Your current performance is usable, with room to sharpen what resonates.

avgComments.role: Comments indicate deeper intent, which can strengthen follow decisions.
avgComments.status: Your current performance suggests discussion can be encouraged further.

engagementVolume.role: Engagement volume captures total interaction momentum per post.
engagementVolume.status: Your current signal suggests momentum is present but can be steadier.

postsPerWeek.role: Posting frequency sets how many opportunities you create for people to find you.
postsPerWeek.status: Your current cadence looks sustainable, and consistency is the next lever.

bullets.1: ‚Ä¢ Post-level analysis: publish time, engagement drivers, and why it performed

instagram.connectPromptTitle: Connect Instagram to load real data

missingEnv.title: Environment variables not set
missingEnv.desc: OAuth is not configured. Please set these env vars:
missingEnv.restartHint: After setting them, restart the dev server (npm run dev).

badges.modeHint: A = inferred / estimated. C = official / connected.
badges.inferredDesc: is an estimate from visible signals. Official (C) requires a connected account.

overview.threadsNote: Threads-related insights are inferred from content cadence and engagement overlap signals.

insights.proHint: üîí Detailed explanation & actionable breakdown in Pro

0.title: Strong Engagement Rate
0.description: You're already outperforming the baseline‚Äîyour audience consistently reacts to your content. Next: pick 1‚Äì2 winning formats and repeat them weekly, aiming to increase saves + comments with a clear hook in the first line.

1.title: Optimal Posting Frequency
1.description: Your cadence is healthy and sustainable, which is a strong predictor of steady reach. Next: lock a repeatable weekly rhythm (e.g., 4‚Äì5 posts) and track what happens when you shift timing by 1‚Äì2 hours.

2.title: Comments Drive Visibility
2.description: Your best posts generate more comments‚Äîoften a signal that boosts distribution. Next: add a specific question or an A/B choice prompt, and pin the best reply to keep the thread active.

insights.title: Account Insights

demoNotes.1: This page is a demo output and does not access or store real social data.
demoNotes.2: Metrics and recommendations are model-inferred, not official platform analytics.
demoNotes.3: Use as a decision reference and validate against your actual performance data.

summary.nextStepEngagement: Next step: strengthen hooks and comment velocity
summary.nextStepAutomation: Next step: reduce automation patterns and stabilize activity
summary.nextStepExecute: Next step: execute the top three improvements this week

copy.disclaimer: This report reflects inferred analysis based on public signals, not official platform-provided metrics.

authenticity.title: Account Authenticity
authenticity.desc: Signals consistent with organic human-like activity based on public engagement patterns.
authenticity.note: This is an inferred signal, not a verification of identity.

engagement.title: Engagement Quality
engagement.desc: Evaluated using publicly observable interaction depth, comment structure, and engagement consistency.

automation.title: Automation Risk
automation.desc: Confidence score indicating likelihood of automated-like or abnormal activity patterns based on timing and interaction signals.

toast.connectSoon: Connect flow will be enabled after OAuth setup

performance.title: How your account performs across growth-critical dimensions
performance.radarDesc: Use the radar chart to quickly understand your account‚Äôs structure across content, engagement, frequency, growth, and monetization.
performance.howToInterpret: How to interpret: prioritize the lowest dimension first; it usually caps overall growth.

authenticity.title: Account Authenticity
authenticity.desc: Measures how authentic the account appears based on behavior patterns.

engagement.title: Engagement Quality
engagement.desc: Evaluates the quality and authenticity of engagement.

overview.title: Account Strength Overview
overview.subtitle: Visual representation of key performance indicators

growthPotential.label: Growth Potential
growthPotential.desc: Potential for audience growth based on current metrics

commercialValue.label: Commercial Value
commercialValue.desc: Attractiveness to potential sponsors and advertisers

collaborationReadiness.label: Collaboration Readiness
collaborationReadiness.desc: Suitability for brand partnerships and collaborations

monetization.title: Monetization Readiness
monetization.subtitle: Based on historical patterns observed across similar public creator profiles.

paywall.stat: Only 18% of accounts with this profile consistently monetize.
paywall.desc: Best for creators and teams who want a repeatable revenue path without sacrificing growth.

items.actionPlan: Priority action plan for the next 14 days

paywall.note: You‚Äôll receive a clear plan, priorities, and platform-specific actions.

next.title: Recommended Next Actions
next.subtitle: A focused 3-step plan mapped to the strongest signals and current constraints.
next.desc1: Standardize your posting format and cadence for the next 7 days to stabilize distribution.
next.desc2: Tighten your hook and early CTA to lift retention and drive higher-quality comments.
next.desc3: Unlock the monetization roadmap to prioritize the highest-impact revenue actions.

s1.title: Improve content consistency
s1.line2: Focus on a repeatable format and cadence for the next 7 days.

s2.title: Optimize engagement hooks
s2.line1: Increase early retention and qualified interactions.
s2.line2: Use clearer CTAs and comment prompts in the first 2 lines.

s3.title: Activate monetization signals
s3.line2: Introduce consistent callouts to offers, case studies, or lead magnets.

copyable.title: Copyable Summary
copyable.subtitle: Share a compact snapshot with your team or clients.
copyable.disclaimer: Analysis is based on publicly observable data, historical patterns, and inferred behavioral models. No private data or direct account access is used.

footer.line: Used by creators, agencies, and growth teams to evaluate social account potential.
footer.proPitchTitle: Need deeper official benchmarks and comparisons?
footer.proPitchDesc: If you‚Äôre ready to turn this report into an actionable growth plan.
footer.proModalDesc: Pro includes a clearer strategy, reusable templates, and a prioritized growth roadmap.

proModalBullets.1: A clearer strategy with step-by-step execution
proModalBullets.2: A prioritized roadmap (what to do first, next, later)
proModalBullets.3: More copy-ready content and engagement templates

states.noResultsDesc: We couldn't find any analysis results. Please try analyzing an account again.

post.title: Single Post Analysis
post.subtitle: Inferred insights from public signals. Official post metrics are only shown after explicit platform authorization.
post.modeExplain:
A (Inferred): based on public observable signals and inferred models.
C (Official): shown only after explicit platform authorization.

loading.resultsDesc: Preparing inferred signals and draft recommendations‚Ä¶

preview.title: Post Preview
preview.subtitle: Preview (mock) derived from the provided link.
preview.caption: Caption (mock):
preview.note1: No image parsing is performed. This preview is a placeholder for UI flow.
preview.note2: This preview is UI-only and does not fetch or parse the post content.

quick.title: Quick Recommendations
quick.subtitle: Expandable suggestions based on inferred friction points.

unlock.title: Unlock official post performance
unlock.subtitle: Authorize to view platform-provided metrics and benchmarks (C mode).
unlock.note: Read-only authorization. No posting and no DM access.

health.title: Post Health Summary
health.subtitle: Inferred indicators based on publicly observable signals and patterns.
health.note: This section is inferred guidance, not official analytics.

hook.title: Hook Strength
hook.detail: Signals suggest the first-frame value proposition is present but may not be explicit enough for cold viewers.

clarity.title: Content Clarity
clarity.detail: Likely impacted by dense phrasing or competing focal points that increase cognitive load.

readability.title: Visual Readability
readability.detail: Signals suggest on-screen text hierarchy and contrast may reduce fast comprehension on mobile.

interaction.title: Interaction Cues
interaction.detail: Likely impacted by CTA placement; the cue exists but may not be strong enough to trigger comments or saves.

dropoff.title: Drop-off Risk
dropoff.detail: Signals suggest early-scrolling or swipe-away risk due to delayed payoff within the first seconds.

underperform.title: Why This Post May Underperform
underperform.subtitle: Consultant-style diagnosis based on likely constraints (non-accusatory, inferred).

reasons.1: The initial hook may not clearly communicate the value within the first visible frame.
reasons.2: Visual hierarchy may increase interpretation cost, especially on small screens.
reasons.3: Interaction prompts are present, but likely not specific enough to drive replies or saves.

rewrite.title: Actionable Rewrite Suggestions
rewrite.subtitle: Copy-ready rewrites and visual guidance based on inferred friction points.

hooks.1: If you're doing X, you're losing reach ‚Äî here's the 10‚Äësecond fix.
hooks.2: Most creators miss this one signal. Fix it, and your next post performs better.
hooks.3: Before you post today, check this ‚Äî it likely affects distribution.

ctas.1: Comment 'PLAN' and I'll share the checklist.
ctas.2: Save this for your next post ‚Äî and tell me which part you'd improve first.

visuals.1: Keep the first on-screen line under ~7 words and lead with a single keyword.
visuals.2: Align text to one edge and increase contrast for fast scanning.
visuals.3: Use one primary focal point per frame; avoid competing callouts.

vsAvg.title: Compared to account average
vsAvg.note: Benchmarking uses your recent post baseline after authorization.

contrast.title: Content Quality vs Actual Performance
contrast.subtitle: A diagnostic contrast between inferred quality and observed outcomes
contrast.note: This suggests distribution or timing constraints rather than content quality issues.

snapshot.title: Copyable Snapshot
snapshot.subtitle: A compact summary you can paste into a doc or share with a client.

copy.modeHint: A = inferred / C = official after authorization
copy.disclaimer: Analysis in A mode is based on publicly observable signals and inferred models. Official metrics are only shown after explicit platform authorization.
copy.shortDisclaimer: A-mode is inferred from public signals. Official metrics unlock after authorization.

export.notOfficial: Not official metrics unless C mode is explicitly authorized.

footer.disclaimer: A-mode analysis is based on publicly observable signals and inferred models. Official metrics are read and shown only after explicit authorization.

input.sectionSubtitle: Paste an Instagram or Threads post link.
input.label: Post Link
input.hint: A-mode is inferred from public signals. Official metrics unlock after authorization.
input.pasteToBegin: Paste a post link to begin.
input.invalidUrl: The link may be invalid. Please include instagram.com or threads.net.

footer.disclaimer: This tool provides inferred/demo output and does not guarantee accuracy. Official metrics are shown only after explicit authorization. This tool is not affiliated with IG/Threads/Meta.
footer.compliance: Please verify compliance requirements for your use case. Consider professional legal advice if needed.
